0.2.1 (2024-01-22)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**Features and Improvements**

- First release
- Allow user to search AWS service console url or sub menu url.
- Allow user to switch AWS region by typing ``!@``.
